Plot: Did you know that you are the creator of your own destiny and life experiences? Do you wonder why all these positive and most especially negative things happen to you? Is every happenstance in your life coincidental or there is something more to them? Do you have any part to play in every happenings in your life: whether positive or negative? How will it be to you, if you uncovered the underlying principle behind every occurrence in your life and how you can consciously guide yourself to create more positive life experiences? Are you ready for an adventure in creating your own life? Then this book is for you. In this book, you will discover; a. Your divine nature; the god you are, from the spiritual and scientific point of view b. The power and authority you wield in your being c. How to create your own life with this power and authority d. The infinite possibilities that awaits you. Create Your Own Life is an easy-to-read-and-understand book. The author takes the quite sophisticated scientific and spiritual ideologies, and simplifies them with every day-easy-to-remember illustrations to help you create a better life for yourself and loved ones
